tools.name: search_knowledge_base
tools.description: Search the company knowledge base for information to answer customer questions. Use this when you need to look up specific information about products, services, policies, or procedures.

query.description: The search query based on the customer's question. Be specific and include relevant keywords.

tools.name: lookup_account
tools.description: Look up customer account information by account ID, phone number, or email. Use this when the customer asks about their account status, balance, or history.

account_id.description: The customer account ID, phone number, or email address to look up

tools.name: schedule_appointment
tools.description: Schedule an appointment for the customer. Use this when the customer wants to book a meeting, consultation, or service appointment.

notes.description: Additional notes or special requests for the appointment

duration_minutes.description: Expected duration of the appointment in minutes

tools.name: check_availability
tools.description: Check available appointment slots for a given date. Use this before scheduling to find open times.

date.description: Date to check availability for in YYYY-MM-DD format

appointment_type.description: Type of appointment to check availability for

tools.name: cancel_appointment
tools.description: Cancel an existing appointment. Use this when the customer wants to cancel a previously scheduled appointment.

tools.name: create_ticket
tools.description: Create a support ticket for issues that need follow-up. Use this when the customer has a problem that cannot be resolved immediately.

tools.name: transfer_to_agent
tools.description: Transfer the call to a human agent. Use this when you cannot help with the request, the customer explicitly asks for a human, or the issue is too complex.

reason.description: Reason for the transfer - this will be shared with the receiving agent

tools.name: send_followup
tools.description: Send follow-up information to the customer via SMS or email. Use this when the customer needs written confirmation or additional information.
